snippet.title: We Need to Go Deeper | Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming February 8th, 2017. Add We Need to Go Deeper to your wishlist on Steam now: http://store.steampowered.com/app/307110/

More info on our official site: http://weneedtogodeeper.com/

We Need to Go Deeper is a 2-4-player cooperative submarine rogue-like set in a Verne-inspired undersea universe. In the game, you and your crew must embark on many voyages into a mysterious undersea trench known as The Living Infinite.
